Question: On June 25, 2010, the first anniversary of this person's death, fans traveled to Los Angeles to pay their tribute to him.
Hints: In March 1988, this person purchased land near Santa Ynez, California, to build Neverland Ranch at a cost of $17 million.
The show, which visited five continents and 35 countries, became this person's most successful in terms of audience figures.
This person's 1982 album Thriller is the best-selling album of all time.
